$interpreted: Yan-Bo: Take some time to rest, all that's left to do. Recover, he will.
Hestia: Thank you, Yan-Bo!
Hestia: Prince, are you alright?
Cecil: Yes, I'm fine...
Yan-Bo: Hestia, this young fella, the prince who saved you ten years ago, is he?
Hestia: Yes, we finally met each other again!
Pang: It has been ten years. Are you sure it's him?
Cecil: W-What do you mean?
Hestia: Of course he is.
Hestia: Even though I was very little and my memory is a bit blurry, but Cecil is able to describe all the details of my rescue!
Yan-Bo: Mr. Cecil, the person who kidnapped Hestia ten years ago, was who?
Yan-Bo: And rescue her, how did you?
Cecil: I, umm...
Pang: Can't answer?
Cecil: She was captured from a foreign country by a lowly poacher group. That's why I saved her. What's strange about that?
Yan-Bo: Then, as a Kingdom of the Sun noble, sneaked into a so-called lowly poacher group and rescued Hestia, how did you?
Pang: Ten years ago, you were also a mere child in his teens. Did you really have that kind of ability?
Cecil: What is the meaning of this? Are you people doubting me?
Pang: Hestia is my friend. Since you want to leave with her, of course I'm going to ask for the details.
Yan-Bo: A naive child, Hestia is.
Yan-Bo: In order to prevent people from taking advantage of her innocence, put you through rigorous inspection, we must. Please forgive us.
Hestia: Guys, stop it. Cecil is not a bad person.
Cecil: I am not obliged to respond to you people. Hestia, let's go!
Hestia: Cecil, do you have to be in such a hurry?
Hestia: I haven't say goodbye to the Platypuses. They took very good care of me when I was little. I want to...
Cecil: Oh, you don't want to leave? Fine then; don't waste my time!
Hestia: Cecil!
Hestia: What are you guys doing! Why do you have to talk to Cecil like that?
Pang: We're just concerned that you might be deceived...
Hestia: I don't need you to stick your noses in my business! Ugh, so mad!
Hestia: Cecil~
Pang: Master Yan-Bo, shouldn't we chase after her?
Yan-Bo: Whatever. Do as she wish, she can.
Hestia: Cecil~ Cecil~That's strange. Where did he go?
Hestia: Puggi, why are you here?
Puggi: Hearty Hestia~
Puggi: I feel like there's some fun around here, that's why I came to check it out~
Hestia: Umm...but Pang says that whenever you sense fun, then it's guaranteed trouble...
Puggi: Shhhh, quiet!
Puggi: Fun sensors tingling...over there! Let's get moving!
Hestia: Hey, wait up!
Puggi: Hoho, this is the place~
Hestia: What's your point of running here...
Hestia: Hmm, is that?
Cecil: Damnit, I thought I could easily lure that mermaid out!
Arcane Soldier: Young master, please calm down...nonetheless, how did you know that there's a mermaid at Maple Lake?
Cecil: Father used to work with a poacher group. Together, they had a business that sold rare creatures from foreign countries.
Arcane Soldier: So Sir Douglas used to do that kinda stuff...
Cecil: Ten years ago, I accompanied father here to discuss a transaction. Somehow, I got into an argument with father due to some petty child complaints.
Cecil: In order to take revenge on him, I secretly released the most expensive creature he had, the mermaid, so he would be embarrassed in front of his client.
Arcane Soldier: Young master, how could you do something like that?
Cecil: I was a child back then. What else do you expect!
Cecil: Not the time to argue that. Now, we just need to take that dumb mermaid away. As long as we sell her, the Vincent family's debt will be...
Cecil: Hestia!?
Hestia: I see...so you're in such a hurry to take me away only because you want to sell me?
Cecil: So what? Since it came down to this, I'll just have to do it the hard way!
Puggi: Haha, taste that, you heartless loser! Do you know how AWESOME Sir Puggi is now!?
Arcane Soldier: You were hiding behind the mermaid doing nothing all that time, weren't you!
Cecil: Damnit...retreat!
Hestia: ...So these past ten years, I was...
Puggi: Hearty Hestia, you alright?

Model.Text: Take some time to rest, all that's left to do. Recover, he will.
Thank you, Yan-Bo!
Prince, are you alright?
Yes, I'm fine...
Hestia, this young fella, the prince who saved you ten years ago, is he?
Yes, we finally met each other again!
It has been ten years. Are you sure it's him?
W-What do you mean?
Of course he is.
Even though I was very little and my memory is a bit blurry, but Cecil is able to describe all the details of my rescue!
Mr. Cecil, the person who kidnapped Hestia ten years ago, was who?
And rescue her, how did you?
I, umm...
Can't answer?
She was captured from a foreign country by a lowly poacher group. That's why I saved her. What's strange about that?
Then, as a Kingdom of the Sun noble, sneaked into a so-called lowly poacher group and rescued Hestia, how did you?
Ten years ago, you were also a mere child in his teens. Did you really have that kind of ability?
What is the meaning of this? Are you people doubting me?
Hestia is my friend. Since you want to leave with her, of course I'm going to ask for the details.
A naive child, Hestia is.
In order to prevent people from taking advantage of her innocence, put you through rigorous inspection, we must. Please forgive us.
Guys, stop it. Cecil is not a bad person.
I am not obliged to respond to you people. Hestia, let's go!
Cecil, do you have to be in such a hurry?
I haven't say goodbye to the Platypuses. They took very good care of me when I was little. I want to...
Oh, you don't want to leave? Fine then; don't waste my time!
Cecil!
What are you guys doing! Why do you have to talk to Cecil like that?
We're just concerned that you might be deceived...
I don't need you to stick your noses in my business! Ugh, so mad!
Cecil~
Master Yan-Bo, shouldn't we chase after her?
Whatever. Do as she wish, she can.
Cecil~ Cecil~That's strange. Where did he go?
Puggi, why are you here?
Hearty Hestia~
I feel like there's some fun around here, that's why I came to check it out~
Umm...but Pang says that whenever you sense fun, then it's guaranteed trouble...
Shhhh, quiet!
Fun sensors tingling...over there! Let's get moving!
Hey, wait up!
Hoho, this is the place~
What's your point of running here...
Hmm, is that?
Damnit, I thought I could easily lure that mermaid out!
Young master, please calm down...nonetheless, how did you know that there's a mermaid at Maple Lake?
Father used to work with a poacher group. Together, they had a business that sold rare creatures from foreign countries.
So Sir Douglas used to do that kinda stuff...
Ten years ago, I accompanied father here to discuss a transaction. Somehow, I got into an argument with father due to some petty child complaints.
In order to take revenge on him, I secretly released the most expensive creature he had, the mermaid, so he would be embarrassed in front of his client.
Young master, how could you do something like that?
I was a child back then. What else do you expect!
Not the time to argue that. Now, we just need to take that dumb mermaid away. As long as we sell her, the Vincent family's debt will be...
Hestia!?
I see...so you're in such a hurry to take me away only because you want to sell me?
So what? Since it came down to this, I'll just have to do it the hard way!
Haha, taste that, you heartless loser! Do you know how AWESOME Sir Puggi is now!?
You were hiding behind the mermaid doing nothing all that time, weren't you!
Damnit...retreat!
...So these past ten years, I was...
Hearty Hestia, you alright?
